content: Hello, thanks for contacting XYZ Home Services! I'm here to help you schedule a service appointment. May I have your name, please?

Just call me Ms. Waters. My A/C is broken down again, and I need someone ASAP. I live out in Willow Heights. Your regular guy says it’s out of your zone but I’m not waiting another week for someone else.
Thank you, Ms. Waters. I understand this is urgent. Could you please provide your full address in Willow Heights so I can double-check our service area?
4942 Lantern Road, Willow Heights. And don’t tell me you can’t come. I’ll pay extra if you need, just get here!
Thank you for providing your address, Ms. Waters. I’m going to check if Willow Heights is within our service area, but I want to help if possible. Please hold for a moment.

Ms. Waters, I’m sorry, but Willow Heights is currently outside our standard service area. At this time, we aren’t able to schedule appointments there. If you’d like, I can recommend a few local providers or check if exceptions can be made.
You’re joking—I KNOW your guys have been here before! Just put me through to a real person and stop giving me the runaround.

I apologize for the inconvenience, Ms. Waters. Since you’d like to speak with a real person about your situation, I’m connecting you to a human representative who can review your request and help further.
reason: Customer requested assistance from a human representative.
